title: Police investigating accidental shooting of teen
content:
Rocky Mount police are investigating the Monday morning wounding of a teenager.
Authorities said the unidentified 16-year-old male called police around 9:30 a.m. after stopped his vehicle on Old Mill Road. The victim was transported to Nash General Hospital for treatment of non-life threatening injuries.
Police said the investigation has led them to believe the shooting happened on the 800 block of Nashville Road, but is likely to have been accidental. The investigation is ongoing. Anyone with information is asked to contact Crime Stoppers at 977-1111 or crimestoppers@rockymountnc.gov. Text a tip to police at 274637 by beginning messages with RMPOL to direct the tip to the Rocky Mount Police Department and type up to 155 characters about the information.
